terramc_staff.name: TerraMC - Staff
terramc_staff.description: Shows you information for TerraMC - Staff

nameTagConfiguration.name: §7» §fShow Staff NameTag
nameTagConfiguration.description: Displays the Rank of a Staff member.

showTag.name: §7» §fShow Text-Tag
showTag.description: Displays the Rank of a Staff member above their name.

showIconTag.name: §7» §fShow Icon-Tag
showIconTag.description: Displays the TerraMC Logo next to a staff member's name.

showIconInTab.name: §7» §fShow Icon in Tablist
showIconInTab.description: Displays the TerraMC logo in front of a team member's name in the tab list.

nameTagColor.name: §7» §fColor of the Text-Tag
nameTagColor.description: Change the color of the 'TERRAMC' text in the Text-Tag

textDecoration.name: §7» §fText decoration
textDecoration.description: Change the text decoration of the 'TERRAMC' text in the Text-Tag

updateStatsOnJoin.name: Update stats on join
updateStatsOnJoin.description: When enabled, your stats will get updated if you join on TerraMC.net.

enableAutoGG.name: §7» §fAutoGG
enableAutoGG.description: Sends automatically a 'GG' on the end of the round in the chat.

error.title: §7§l§o▎§8§l§o▏ §4TerraMC - Error
error.stats-coolDown: §cYou can only update your stats every 5 minutes.

api.stats: §cAn error occurred while loading your stats.
api.data: §cAn error occurred while loading the data.
api.general: §cThe data could not be loaded due to an API error.
api.serverStats: §cAn error occurred while loading the server stats.

general.noAccess: §4You have no access to this site.

cloudNotify.title: §eCloud-Notifications
cloudNotify.description: §7Define how the server start/stop notifications of the cloud should be displayed.

showTagAlways.title: §eShow Tags always
showTagAlways.description: §7Shows team members' tags even if they are nicked or in ToggleRank.
